content.content: Jordi Baylina presented on the subject of ERC-777 at DappConn:  https://twitter.com/lucasvo/status/1020294291627954176 The repo and reference implementation:    GitHub    0xjac/ERC777 New Standard for Ethereum Token. Contribute to 0xjac/ERC777 development by creating an account on GitHub.       Discussion on the GitHub issue:   github.com/ethereum/EIPs     	      ERC777 Token Standard            opened 10:07PM - 20 Nov 17 UTC               jbaylina               Please, see https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-777 for further discussion.          “Everything you need to know” overview of ERC-777 by @alexvandesande on reddit:    reddit    r/ethereum - Everything you need to know about ERC777, the new proposed token... 372 votes and 80 comments so far on Reddit       “ERC-777 A New Advanced Token Standard” by Ankur Daharwal    Medium – 18 Apr 18    ERC-777 A New Advanced Token Standard ERC(Ethereum Request for Comments)-777 Reading time: 6 min read
content.GPT-summary: The post discusses the ERC-777 token standard proposal for Ethereum. The author of the proposal explains it and invites further discussion. Third parties provide constructive criticism, ask questions, and advertise the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author is advertising proposal

content.content: We were tracking 777 at my last company for the last 6 - 8 months. It has lots of great improvements. Education around this as the next best standard for new tokens that are created, and then having Wallets and Exchanges support it is the challenge. I think education and example solidity contracts are the area where this group can help the most. And implementations that inter-work.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
None of the topics listed match

content.content: Hello all, the current status of this standard is that we are very close to go to LAST_CALL.  We are still having some discussions on operatorsList / defaultOperators but we hope to close this debate in the upcoming days. If there is no more big issue, we will proceed to set it to LAST_CALL. Please, for any comment related to the standard join the conversation here: https://github.com/ethereum/eips/issues/777
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
